name: Car-makaze
description: In Car-makaze, you are being attacked by tire-blasting aliens, who will stop at nothing to destroy your car. Your car can`t shoot in this shoot'em up, so you gotta ram 'em! It's a ram'em up! The more damage your car takes, the more damage you can cause to them! Health is rewarded for every kill. Be aggressive, but don't die!
